Reviews.Title: Buy it for the body, lenses, and batteries.  The rest could be left out.
Reviews.Author: Ricardo Salcedo

Reviews.Title: Excellant
Reviews.Author: Elaine
Reviews.Content: A GREAT bargain for the price.  Have had many friends very jealous for what I got!  Was shipped in fantastic time also.  My x=mas present to myself!!!

Reviews.Title: Sunset Electronics,what a joke!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Alan Berden
Reviews.Content: Purchased a Pentax camera kit thru this joke of a store and the only issue I had was with the memory card. The only way they would replace it was to give them a 5 star rating so they would wave the restocking fee????? PLEASE,stick it. I don't need their card or their pety ways of trying to receive a good rating. Is this store that desperate? I know I will never do business with them ever again.

Reviews.Title: Great package.
Reviews.Author: Mark D.
Reviews.Content: Great package at an amazing price. One purchase and I got a great starting package. The flash and tripod were kind of weak but no problem I ordered better ones and am using the ones that come with the package as back up.
